programme.title: Fast Bullets
programme.desc: Two Texas Rangers (Tom Tyler, Rex Lease) nab smugglers and rescue a woman (Margaret Nearing) from a runaway wagon.

programme.title: Mason of the Mounted
programme.desc: A young constable searches for a murderer and finds the suspect managing a prosperous horse-stealing gang.

programme.title: Hellgate
programme.desc: After the Civil War, ranch owner Gil Hanley helps a stranger in desperate need of medical attention. Soon he is questioned by Union soldiers about the stranger, who turns out to be an ex-Confederate soldier.

programme.title: Rawhide Rangers
programme.desc: An ex-lawman infiltrates an outlaw gang to avenge the death of his brother.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: The agents track down a ruthless killer and bring him to justice.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: A Syndicate is trying to steal the formula for an underwater explosive.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: A man travels to Hooterville to investigate a line connection.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate wants to hide the Hooterville Cannonball to save it from the scrap heap.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A phony sheriff is part of a rustling scheme.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho discover the shady motives of a lawyer hired to change a rancher's will.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie look into Ben Thompson's background; Matt gets a job at a gambling den to obtain evidence about Ben's criminal activities.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt arrests John Allison; Frankie's doctor is kidnapped; Clay falls into Matt's trap.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean
programme.desc: The Judge sets out to capture an infamous and dangerous train robber who escaped from prison.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Kenyon and his children come across a cache of gunpowder in an abandoned cabin.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie and Tagg (Gail Davis, Jimmy Hawkins) track a masked bandit who holds up an acrobatic troupe. With Brad Johnson.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) plays matchmaker for her friend Bess Murdock (Nancy Hale). With Don Kennedy, Brad Johnson.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye finds out that his brother has joined the British army and is now a "redcoat."

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachgook find a group of new settlers, trapped in the Huron's territory.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A hired hand (Claude Akins) victimizes the Cartwrights' disabled neighbor (Harry Townes).

programme.title: Sunset Carson Rides Again
programme.desc: A cowboy's partner tries to swindle him out of his land and the money he raised to build a new school.

programme.title: My Pal Trigger
programme.desc: Roy's horse-breeding plans are complicated by a gambler in this fictional account of Trigger's conception and birth.

programme.title: Aces and Eights
programme.desc: Wild Bill Hickok (Tim McCoy) refuses to wear a gun as he saves a ranch and cleans up a town.

programme.title: Ridin' On
programme.desc: A cowboy (Tom Tyler) helps the daughter (Geraine Greer) of his father's (John Elliott) rival (Earl Dwire).

programme.title: The Way of the West
programme.desc: Cattlemen find themselves at odds with sheep ranchers in the Old West.

programme.title: The Man From Utah
programme.desc: A tough cowboy has a head-to-head confrontation with a gang of outlaws using a rodeo as its base of operations.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An ex-army officer accidentally kills a woman's son and tries to make up for it.

programme.title: Colorado Kid
programme.desc: A cowboy (Bob Steele) framed for murder breaks out of jail to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Lost Canyon
programme.desc: After Johnny (Jay Kirby) is accused of robbing a bank, he runs into the hills. When his friend Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) hears what happened, Hopalong sets out to find the real bad guys.

programme.title: Hawk of the Hills
programme.desc: Led by "The Hawk," a band of Indians terrorizes prospectors in a California valley.
